data.name: XmasQuest
data.description:
STORY

On Christmas night, a clown who knows the king's secret escapes.
A clown chase order is given to Alice and her friends who have not recovered their memories at the royal palace.

Ghost town... A deserted town that is not popular. There is a library where ghosts live.
It has become a ghost due to the earthquake and a large amount of gas being washed away.

Goblin Town...No people, lots of goblins who are fire thieves. There is an abandoned hospital there.
When thieves enter Ghost Town, it becomes Goblin Town.

Zombie Town... a city of violence. There is an armory there.
Goblin Town turns into Zombie Town when strong zombies begin to dominate weak goblins with violence.

Dracula City... Citizens are all scammers. There is a jewelry store there.
A nation of scammers has been created by skillfully deceiving the strongmen of Zombie Town.


Old RPGs can be converted to VR as soon as they are created in this format.
